name: Iron Road Limited
description: Iron Road Limited is an Australian company focused on the development and operation of iron ore projects. Established in 2010, Iron Road aims to become a leading iron ore producer through its flagship project, the Central Eyre Iron Project (CEIP), located in South Australia. The CEIP is designed to produce high-quality iron ore concentrate and is strategically positioned to take advantage of existing infrastructure, including nearby rail and port facilities. The company is committed to sustainable mining practices and aims to minimize its environmental impact while maximizing community benefits. Iron Road is also exploring innovative technologies to enhance its operational efficiency and reduce costs. With a strong emphasis on safety and sustainability, Iron Road is poised to contribute significantly to the global iron ore market while supporting local economies. The company is actively engaged in negotiations with potential customers and partners to secure long-term off-take agreements, ensuring a stable revenue stream as it progresses through the development phases of its projects.

seo.meta_title: Iron Road Limited | Iron Ore Development in Australia
seo.meta_description: Iron Road Limited is focused on iron ore project development in Australia, aiming for sustainable operations and high-quality product offerings.

faq.question: What is Iron Road known for?
faq.answer: Iron Road is known for its development of the Central Eyre Iron Project and its focus on sustainable mining practices.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Iron Road?
faq.answer: Andrew McDonald is the CEO of Iron Road Limited.

faq.question: Where is Iron Road headquartered?
faq.answer: Iron Road is headquartered in Adelaide, South Australia, Australia.

faq.question: What products does Iron Road offer?
faq.answer: Iron Road primarily offers iron ore concentrate.
